title: WTT T206 Ewing double factory. SOLD
author: dog*dirt

posts.post_title: WTT T206 Ewing double factory. SOLD
posts.post_content:
I know it may be a long shot but would like to trade this Ewing for a T206 AB back in the gd-vg range. I will also take offers if you do not have any AB back to trade.  If interested please email me at [url]andrewhahn55@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks,
Andrew

Thanks for the sweet deal on this card Andrew!

A good compliment to my T206 Freak Collection.

Craig
